entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as the one who is wearing the Invisibility Cloak and knocking on Hagrid's cabin door. He is mentioned as 'us' when speaking to Hagrid, indicating that he is part of a group.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as the one who pokes her head around the door and whispers to Harry. She is mentioned as 'we' when speaking to Hagrid, indicating that she is part of a group.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as the one who answers the door and lets Harry and Hermione in. He is mentioned as being pale-faced and trembling, indicating that he is nervous or scared.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is described as the object that Harry and Hermione are wearing to remain hidden. It is mentioned as being used to sneak into Hagrid's cabin.

entities.name: forbidden forest
entities.description: The Forbidden Forest is described as a location where the sun is setting behind it, gilding the top branches of the trees. It is mentioned as being part of the grounds surrounding Hagrid's cabin.

entities.name: hagrid's cabin
entities.description: Hagrid's cabin is described as a location where Harry and Hermione go to seek refuge. It is mentioned as being located in the grounds surrounding the Forbidden Forest.
